mapper.select: SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT num, writer, content, target_id, ref_group, comment_group, deleted, TO_CHAR(regdate,'YYYY.MM.DD') regdate FROM board_reserve_comment WHERE ref_group=#{ref_group} ORDER BY comment_group ASC, num ASC) result1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_reserve_comment (num, writer, content, target_id, ref_group, comment_group, regdate) VALUES(#{num}, #{writer}, #{content}, #{target_id}, #{ref_group}, #{comment_group}, SYSDATE)
